text: Searching for Monica () is a 1962 Argentine-Spanish black-and-white film musical film drama directed by José María Forqué. The film premiered on 29 January 1962 in Madrid and was named El Secreto de Mónica. It was first shown in Argentina on 29 March in Buenos Aires. It starred Alberto de Mendoza and Carmen Sevilla. ==Cast== ==External links== * Category:Argentine musical drama films Category:Spanish films Category:1962 films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by José María Forqué Category:Argentine films Category:1960s musical drama films Category:1962 drama films
title: Searching for Monica
